birthdayMessageAge: Lets all wish {member} a very happy birthday. They're turning {member.age} today! :cake:
birthdayMessage: Everyone wish {member} a very happy birthday! :cake:
disboardDefault: We'd really appreciate it if you bumped the server on Disboard. Use the command `!d bump` and I'll notify you in **two hours**.
reminderToChannelWithUser:
Hey {{user}}! On **{{time, fulldatetime}}** you wanted me to remind you:
> *{{text}}*
reminderToDM:
